name: Cerberus
description: Introducting Cerberus (pronounced - [ kur-ber-uhs]) the first ever three headed dog meme-coin in Cosmos network Cerberus will be a community lead meme-coin that will allow the community to vote on various proposals on the future use of the coin. The community can gain value from the coin by staking Cerberus ($CRBRUS) with delegators and liquidity pools.
